冠.definition: to put on a hat; to be first; to dub

冠冕.definition: royal crown; official hat; official; leader; chief; elegant and stately

冠名.definition: to name (a sports team, a competition etc)

冠斑犀鳥.definition: (bird species of China) oriental pied hornbill (Anthracoceros albirostris)

冠海雀.definition: (bird species of China) Japanese murrelet (Synthliboramphus wumizusume)

冠狀.definition: coronary (i.e. relating to the coronary arteries or veins); crown-shaped

冠狀動脈旁路移植手術.pinyin: guan1 zhuang4 dong4 mai4 pang2 lu4 yi2 zhi2 shou3 shu4

冠狀動脈旁通手術.pinyin: guan1 zhuang4 dong4 mai4 pang2 tong1 shou3 shu4

冠禮.definition: the capping ceremony, a Confucian coming of age ceremony for males dating from pre-Qin times, performed when a boy reaches the age of 20, involving the ritual placing of caps on the head of the young man

冠紋柳鶯.definition: (bird species of China) Claudia's leaf warbler (Phylloscopus claudiae)

冠縣.definition: Guan County in Liaocheng 聊城[Liao2 cheng2], Shandong

冠魚狗.definition: (bird species of China) crested kingfisher (Megaceryle lugubris)

冠麻鴨.definition: (bird species of China) crested shelduck (Tadorna cristata)
